name: Charlie
description: Charlie is a meme-based ERC-20 token with zero tax, renounced ownership, and no transaction limits. It was featured in Ethereumâ€™s official GitHub and blog as a meme-ready concept, inspiring the creation of the token. Designed to be fully decentralized and owned by its holders, Charlie represents open participation, Ethereum-native meme culture, and on-chain identity with no central control or roadmap.
